headline: Is Altria Group, Inc. (MO) The Best Cheap Dividend Stock To Buy Right Now?
summary: We recently published a list of 13 Best Cheap Dividend Stocks To Buy Right Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Altria Group, Inc. headline: British American Tobacco vs. Altria: Does Stronger Volume Performance Make BAT a Buy?
summary: Altria (NYSE: MO) and British American Tobacco (NYSE: BTI) both have attractively large yields, at 7.4% and 7.7%, respectively.  This is particularly true in North America, where Altria is focused.  Altria's volume declined 9.7% in 2022, 9.9% in 2023, and 10.2% in 2024.
